casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Norfolk Junior BEST 300A93-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 24, 2019 Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michael Unti, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jay H. Ferguson, Attorney at Law, Durham, Erica W. Washington, Attorney at Law, for Best, Norfolk Junior.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 24th of May 2019 by Defendant-Appellant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of May 2019."

Defendant-Appellant shall have up to and including the 10th of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
